Sub :  
 
STANDARDISED LIST OF EQUIPMENT FOR  
 
 
 
BOMB DETECTION AND DISPOSAL SQUADS 
 
 
1. 
In order to ensure an effective deployment of Bomb Detection and Disposal equipment, 
a standardized list of equipment as given in the Appendix is mandatory for all Bomb Detection 
and Disposal Squads. These equipment are divided into various sub heads:- 
 
 
(a) 
Search Equipment. 
 
 
(b) 
Detection Equipment. 
 
 
(c) 
Disposal Equipment. 
 
 
(d) 
Protection Equipment. 
 
 
(e) 
Transportation Equipment. 
 
2. 
During the procurement of the equipment, the concerned agencies are advised to follow 
the minimum technical specifications of the equipment as prescribed by BCAS for procurement. 
 
3. 
The concerned Airport Director in consultation with the representatives of BCAS, ASG 
shall jointly decide the sites for installation of relevant equipment. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
( Shri M. Malaviya, IPS) 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Addl Commissioner of  Security, (CA)
